description: [GuLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0561) has the ability to inject shellcode into a donor processes that is started in a suspended state. [GuLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0561) has previously used RegAsm as a donor process.(Citation: Medium Eli Salem GuLoader April 2021)

external_references.description: Salem, E. (2021, April 19). Dancing With Shellcodes: Cracking the latest version of Guloader. Retrieved July 7, 2021.
